content.rendered:
CT/PET Scanner | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Position is PRN (as needed)
  • CT with PET (Positron Emission Tomography) Tech experience
  • Would assist, prepare and position patients as required to perform procedures
  • Employ radiation protection measures and follows departmental protocols
  • Would perform daily quality control calibration checks on all equipment in order to ensure the equipment is calibrated and working properly before any patient study is performed
  • Maintain all equipment in good working condition and cleanliness; reports equipment problems to the supervisor
  • Perform quality control, quality assurance and safety test and follow radiation safety guidelines
  • Compensation is DOE
